<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Marsh Runner](/Feats.aspx?ID=5635) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=760" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 26 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
You have a swim Speed.

</column>

---

When you use the Step action, you can ignore [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) caused by flooding, swamps, or quicksand. In addition, when you use the [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) skill to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=2369) on narrow surfaces or uneven marshy ground, you aren't [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58), and if you roll a success on the Acrobatics check, you get a critical success instead.
name: Marsh Runner
